tasks.title: Design and Implement Profile Capture Interface
tasks.description: Create a guided text-to-speech form for users to enter skills, education, experience highlights, and job preferences without uploading a traditional resume.
tasks.details: Develop a multi-step form UI with structured fields for skills, years of experience, tech stack, desired roles, preferred company size, and industry. Integrate the Hugging Face 'openai/whisper-small' speech-to-text model configured for English to capture user input via voice. Provide transcript display for user confirmation and editing before saving. Highlight critical fields for easy verification. Ensure the UI clearly labels each step and primary call to action.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct usability testing with first-time users to verify they can complete profile creation within five major interactions. Test speech-to-text accuracy across accents and verify transcript editing functionality. Confirm that critical fields are highlighted and editable. Validate that no raw audio is stored and that privacy notices are displayed.

tasks.title: Develop Profile Data Storage and Management
tasks.description: Implement backend services to store user profile data securely and enable retrieval for job matching without requiring re-entry each session.
tasks.details: Design a Profile Service that stores structured profile data including skills, experience, and preferences. Separate personal identity information from anonymized feature representations. Ensure data privacy by not storing raw audio and by anonymizing data sent to AI services. Provide APIs for profile creation, update, and retrieval.
tasks.testStrategy: Test data persistence across sessions. Verify that personal identifiers are not stored or transmitted to AI services. Perform security audits to ensure data privacy compliance within prototype scope.

tasks.title: Implement AI Integration Layer with Hugging Face Models
tasks.description: Create an abstraction layer to integrate with external Hugging Face AI models and OpenAI API for semantic job matching, company summarization, speech-to-text transcription, and structured skills extraction, including timeout and fallback logic.
tasks.details: Develop an AI Integration Service that incorporates multiple AI components: 1) Hugging Face Whisper model for speech-to-text transcription, 2) OpenAI API using Chat Completions in JSON mode for structured skills extraction from transcripts, and 3) Hugging Face models for semantic job matching and company summarization. Implement timeout and retry mechanisms for all AI calls. On failure or timeout of Hugging Face models, fallback to a keyword-based matching strategy; on failure or timeout of OpenAI API calls, fallback to simple text parsing for skills extraction. Ensure user notifications are provided when approximate or fallback results are shown. Maintain strict separation of PII from AI calls in compliance with ASR3.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate failures and timeouts for both Hugging Face and OpenAI API calls to verify fallback mechanisms trigger correctly. Measure latency to ensure AI responses are returned within five seconds. Confirm user notifications appear appropriately when fallback strategies are used. Validate that all data sent externally is anonymized and that no PII is transmitted.

tasks.title: Build Explainable Matching Pipeline
tasks.description: Develop a matching engine that outputs numeric scores and intermediate features used in scoring to enable human-readable explanations of job fit.
tasks.details: Design the matching pipeline to compute match scores based on skills, experience, and preferences overlap. Extract and expose intermediate features such as matched skills, relevant experience, and preference alignment. Store these features alongside scores for frontend consumption to generate explanations.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate that matching outputs include detailed feature data. Test explanation generation on frontend using these features. Confirm explanations reference at least three elements per job match.

tasks.title: Create Frontend Components for Job Recommendations and Explanations
tasks.description: Develop UI components to display job recommendations with clear, simple explanations of why each job fits the user profile.
tasks.details: Implement job recommendation list rendering with explanation text referencing matched skills, experience, and preferences. Use non-technical language understandable by students and early-career professionals. Ensure explanations update dynamically based on matching pipeline output.
tasks.testStrategy: User test clarity and understandability of explanations with at least 80% positive feedback. Verify explanations reference required elements. Check responsiveness and rendering speed.

tasks.title: Develop Company Insight Card Generation
tasks.description: Automatically generate concise company insight cards summarizing company size, industry (including multiple industries from user profiles), description, and key job responsibilities or technologies using AI or text summarization.
tasks.details: Use AI summarization models integrated via the AI layer to extract and condense company and job description data into insight cards. Include company size category, industry/domain information that may consist of multiple industries selected by users, a brief company description, and 2-3 key responsibilities or technologies. Ensure the insight card generation handles matching against multiple user-selected industries and that cards are generated without the user needing to open external pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify accuracy and conciseness of generated insight cards. Test automatic generation for all recommended jobs, ensuring that multiple industries from user profiles are correctly matched and represented. Confirm cards display required information clearly, including multiple industry/domain entries when applicable.

tasks.title: Implement Performance Optimization and Responsiveness
tasks.description: Ensure the system returns and renders top ten job recommendations with explanations and company insight cards within five seconds under normal network conditions.
tasks.details: Optimize backend query performance, AI call latency, and frontend rendering. Use caching strategies where appropriate. Monitor and profile system to meet the five-second response time requirement in classroom demo environment.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct load and latency testing simulating typical user queries. Measure end-to-end response times. Identify and fix bottlenecks to meet performance criteria.

tasks.title: Enforce Data Privacy and Security Boundaries
tasks.description: Implement architectural separation to ensure only anonymized or minimal profile data is sent to external AI services, protecting user identity and privacy.
tasks.details: Separate Profile Service holding PII from AI Matching Service that only receives anonymized feature representations. Implement data transformation layers to strip identifiers before AI calls. For OpenAI API usage, ensure only transcript text (no PII) from speech-to-text conversion is sent to OpenAI for skills extraction. Privacy notices must be updated to clearly inform users about OpenAI usage for skills extraction. Provide clear interfaces and audit logging for data flows. Display user notices about third-party AI usage and privacy guidance, specifically highlighting OpenAI's role in skills extraction.
tasks.testStrategy: Audit data flows to confirm no PII leakage. Test anonymization transformations. Verify user notices are present and clear, specifically mentioning OpenAI usage for skills extraction. Conduct privacy boundary penetration tests to ensure only transcript text is sent to OpenAI API.

tasks.title: Integrate Speech-to-Text Error Handling and Fallback Mechanisms
tasks.description: Monitor transcription errors and implement fallback to text-only profile capture when speech recognition fails or performs poorly.
tasks.details: Track ASR failure rates and misrecognitions during usage. Provide UI fallback to manual text input if speech-to-text is disabled or unreliable. Inform users clearly about fallback activation. Align fallback with AI integration fault tolerance requirements.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate ASR failures and verify fallback triggers. Test user experience switching between speech and text input. Confirm fallback messages are clear and informative.

tasks.title: Conduct User Testing and Feedback Integration
tasks.description: Perform user testing to validate usability, clarity of explanations, performance, and fairness across diverse English accents and speech patterns.
tasks.details: Recruit representative users including international students and early-career professionals. Test profile creation, job matching, explanation clarity, and company insight usefulness. Collect feedback on speech-to-text accuracy and fairness. Iterate on UI and backend based on findings.
tasks.testStrategy: Measure success indicators: 80% users find explanations clear, profile creation under five steps and ten seconds, and reduced search fatigue. Analyze error patterns and adjust system accordingly.
